content.html: "Tech workers who didn't live through the dot com crash, you have no idea what's coming. Prepare yourselves." This isn't actionable. People who don't know what's coming probably don't know how to prepare for it. Dotcom crash survivors, what is your actionable advice for people?
content.value:
"Tech workers who didn't live through the dot com crash, you have no idea what's coming. Prepare yourselves."

This isn't actionable. People who don't know what's coming probably don't know how to prepare for it.

Dotcom crash survivors, what is your actionable advice for people?
